keyPolicies.policyDescription: Greens will give power back to people to decide the way forward with a People’s Vote. Greens would campaign to Remain in the EU for the benefit of everyone.

For years Greens have led the way on tackling climate chaos. Every vote for the Greens helps speed up climate action. This means cleaner energy, better transport, warmer homes and hundreds of new jobs.
Greens will take action to transform Britain so that it works for everyone. Oppose a Britain of ‘us and them’ created by the Brexit vote.

mentions.candidate: Osman Sen-Chadun is committed to providing a safe and sustainable future for the next generation.

issues.brexitEurope: Greens will give power back to people to decide the way forward with a People’s Vote. Greens would campaign to Remain in the EU for the benefit of everyone.
issues.education: Osman knows the importance of online safety and free education. Using his background in technology he will ensure a safer and greener future for all.
issues.environment: For years Greens have led the way on tackling climate chaos. Every vote for the Greens helps speed up climate action. This means cleaner energy, better transport, warmer homes and hundreds of new jobs.
issues.transport: Osman wants to reduce air pollution through investment in sustainable energy and better public transport.

community.content: Osman wants to reduce air pollution through investment in sustainable energy and better public transport.

endorsements.endorsement: "Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that you can trust to keep the other parties honest. The time is now - please vote Green."

quotes.text: "We already suffer from bad air quality, further fuelled by the burning of thousands of tonnes of hazardous waste (including nuclear) downwind of Southampton at Fawley. With the added risk of more pollution from airport expansion, things could go from bad to worse. Voting Green is a vote for a cleaner future."

examples: Osman Sen-Chadun is committed to providing a safe and sustainable future for the next generation.

"We already suffer from bad air quality, further fuelled by the burning of thousands of tonnes of hazardous waste (including nuclear) downwind of Southampton at Fawley. With the added risk of more pollution from airport expansion, things could go from bad to worse. Voting Green is a vote for a cleaner future."
